Hi Ravi,

On 10/25/06, Ravi <mravi_in@...> wrote:
>  MBeans in Jboss have a field called State which Jboss
>  sets to started using the ServiceCOntroller MBean. If
>  methods in the MBean are dependent on this field. Is
>  there any way to actually set the field without
>  actualy integrating it with the container? or would
>  testing this method constitue a "Junit Integration"
>  test?

Without knowing that much of JMX, if there is a way for your unit test
to set the State in the MBean under test then I'd quite likely opt for
that approach. Do you have an example of an MBean that "depends" on
the state field? Maybe seeing an actual example of the dependency
would help us non-JMX savvy folks on the list understand your
situation better.

Lasse
